name: SHOP OR DROP
description:
SHOP OR DROP is a combination of ability-based ladder-climbing on one side with bejewled mechanics to charge said abilities on the other side of the screen. It was created in an internal Game Jam at Zürich University of the Arts (ZHdK) by 14 students over the course of 3 days.

CONCEPT

The  basic concept is that the player is able to "shop" for weapons and special equipment on a TV (the right side) and use them to progress on the social Ladder (the left side). There are Enemies that are trying to out "climb" the player and obstacles that have to be avoided.

HOW TO PLAY

LEFT SIDE (LADDER RACE)

Your character moves automatically Click on your abilities when they are fully charged to use them. Gain more Speed with your Boost-Ability to Reach the top as fast as possible. Avoid crashing into obstacles and other climbers.

RIGHT SIDE (TELESHOPPING)

Combine 3 items of the same color to charge the Ability of the respective color. The faster you are, the more abilities you get to use on the left side.

ABILITIES

   BOOST Is always active    SWITCH Lane to the left
   HEAL Recovers time damage
   SLOWMO Slow down time    KILL The next obstacle    SWITCH Lane to the right CREDITS
